label: Sensor
comment: An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and transmit such measurements.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying a position of this monitoring sensor.
The percentage of the remaining battery charge of this monitoring IOT device.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A measurement established by a device which is tested to a calibration standard of known accuracy.
A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions of its operation within a specific context.
A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions within which an entity operates correctly.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A measurement established by a device which is tested to a calibration standard of known accuracy.
A measurement established by a device which is tested to a calibration standard of known accuracy.

referencedBy.comment: An embedded sensor of this monitoring IOT device.
A remote sensor of this monitoring IOT device.
